unnormalised: Campus hiring is crucial for talent acquisition. We've had great success recruiting from IIT Delhi. Targeting Tier 2 colleges too is beneficial. Let's start planning for the 2025 batch by 15/10/2024. Schedule initial interviews for 09:00 hrs on 22/11/2024. Compensation package should include benefits as per industry standards in Bangalore, starting from Rs. 6 LPA. Need approvals by 05/09/2024. Early offers can attract top talent. This is important for organizations.
normalised: Campus hiring is crucial for talent acquisition. We've had great success recruiting from I I T Delhi. Targeting Tier two colleges too is beneficial. Let's start planning for the two thousand and twenty five batch by fifteenth october two thousand and twenty four. Compensation package should include benefits as per industry standards in Bangalore, starting from rupee six L P A. Need approvals by fifth september two thousand and twenty four.
